name: Headshaker Ballista
on_hit: The target makes an Engineering save. On a failed save, they are knocked Prone, or, if the target is flying, on a failed save they immediately fall to the ground, and are then knocked Prone.

name: Guardian’s Shield
effect: Gain the Blocking Dive reaction. If this weapon is thrown, Blocking Dive cannot be used until it is retrieved.

actions.name: Blocking Dive
actions.trigger: A hostile character attacks an allied character within a Range equal to your Speed.
actions.detail: You may move a number of spaces up to your Speed towards the allied character, by the most direct route possible. If you would reach the allied character’s space, you take their place, becoming the target of the attack and suffering all of its damage and effects, and the allied character is pushed one space in any direction.

name: Infusable Neurospear
effect: You may attack with this weapon without expending or requiring charges. Instead, you may expend a charge to use the Autoimmune Pulse Full Action.

actions.name: Autoimmune Pulse
actions.detail: Bolster all allied characters within a Burst equal to your Speed.

name: Effete Blades
effect: You begin any fight in either the Sap or String profile, and may change to either the Sap or Sting profile as a protocol. Once you have selected a profile, you remain in it until you take a new profile.

profiles.name: Sap
profiles.effect: On hit, gain Overshield equal to the amount of damage dealt to the target.

profiles.name: Twinned
profiles.effect: On hit, gain Overshield equal to the amount of damage dealt to the target.

name: Life’s Gauntlet
description: Many do not journey beyond the Gate of Life. Its gauntlet is more than enough for even the most robust of souls. Those that do have eyes open to possibility, and rush headlong into the future.
effect: When you attack with this weapon, you may deal damage and trigger other effects (including talents and systems) as though it were an improvised attack. If you do, take 1 Heat.

name: Mooring Hook Cannon
on_hit: If the target fails an Agility save, it is immediately pulled adjacent to you, or as close as possible, by the most direct path.

name: “Harvester” Disassembly Arms
on_hit:
Begin dismantling your target. Roll 1d6 to determine a side effect from the table below.
  1. Compromise Frame: They are Impaired until the end of their next turn and are knocked Prone.
  2. Uncover a Weakness: They are Shredded until the end of their next turn and receive Lock On.
  3. Dismantle motor controls: They are Immobilized until the end of their next turn.
  4. Dismantle system controls: They cannot take or benefit from tech actions until the end of their next turn.
  5. Dismantle weapon controls: They cannot make attacks, other than Improvised Attack, Grapple, and Ram until the end of their next turn.
  6. Demolish: They take 2 AP Kinetic damage, 2 AP Energy damage, and 2 Heat instead of this weapon’s normal damage.
on_crit: Roll 2d6 to determine two side effects instead. If you get the same number on both dice, roll another 1d6 until you get a different number.

name: Scrap Sprayer
effect:
You begin each scene in the Armor Shrapnel profile. You may change this weapon’s profile to any profile of your choice as a Quick Action. When this weapon is reloaded, roll a d20. Depending on the result, a different type of scrap is loaded into this weapon, and it changes profiles accordingly.
  • 1-5: Armor Shrapnel
  • 6-10: Expired Munitions
  • 11-15: Burnt Fuel Rod
  • 16-20: Molten Slag

actions.name: Stockpile
actions.detail: Change the Scrap Sprayer's profile to one of your choice.

profiles.name: Armor Shrapnel
profiles.on_attack: Pummels the ground with hazardous shards in the attack area, creating Difficult Terrain until the end of the scene. Characters in the area also receive +1 Difficulty to Agility checks and saves.

profiles.name: Expired Munitions
profiles.on_attack: Pummels the ground with explosive materials in the attack area. All characters within the affected area may either drop Prone or take an additional 2d6 Explosive damage.

profiles.name: Burnt Fuel Rod
profiles.on_attack: Pummels the ground with hazardous radiation, creating Dangerous Terrain until the end of the scene.

profiles.name: Molten Slag
profiles.effect: Can be fired as Cone 3 or Line 5
profiles.on_attack: Pummels the ground with superheated slag. Characters within the affected area must make a Hull check or take an additional 3 Burn.

name: Bremsstrahlung Emitter
on_hit: The target is Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: Anomaly Vacuum
on_hit: The target is Impaired until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Sweep for Anomalies
actions.detail: Choose either yourself or an ally within this weapon’s Range. The target clears Impaired and Lock On.
